transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good. It takes only two or three minutes to go to the subway station. The front door is Qianmen Street. It takes only five minutes to walk to Dashilan. Although there was a small episode on the first night, the hotel service staff were very enthusiastic and serious. The room was changed immediately the next day. The hotel manager Zhao was also very enthusiastic and helped us deal with the problem in time. The service attitude of the hotel staff is worth it Praise, will continue to stay next time.
